snippet: Mr. Bacigalupi, author of the science fiction novel “The Windup Girl,”  is moving from a tiny specialty press to one of the most highbrow publishers in the business.
abstract: Knopf acquires novel The Water Knife by science-fiction writer Paolo Bacigalupi.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bacigalupi, author of the science fiction novel “The Windup Girl,”  is moving from a tiny specialty press to one of the most highbrow publishers in the business.

headline.main: Knopf Acquires New Paolo Bacigalupi Novel
headline.print_headline: Science Fiction Writer Is Signed by Knopf
